attributes.action: Petition Her Majesty to grant a full immediate pardon to the Victim of burglary jailed for 2.5 Years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Victim was still in the heat of being attacked with his family in his home, and cannot be answerable for his actions while still under the influence of such stress caused by an attacker armed to kill. The attacker initiated the consequences to himself by an unlawful act which should automatically deny him any consideration.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting the Government do. However, if this relates to an individual legal case, we suggest you contact the  Home Office.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
